creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Braided-net fringe, embroidered band, Lined. The ground of red printed cotton is entirely embroidered in cross stitch worked in silk thread. The stitching is particularly fine. There is a cotton embroidered tape edging and a braided fringe terminating in wrapped cotton tassels. The backing is coarsely woven blue cotton fabric, adhered to the reverse with starch paste.
medium: Silk, cotton; cross-stitch, hook chain stitch
title: Ilgich
